org.fcrepo.kernel.modeshape.utils

Class FedoraTypesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.kernel.modeshape.utils.FedoraTypesUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FedoraTypes

    public abstract class FedoraTypesUtils
extends Object
implements FedoraTypes
    Convenience class with static methods for manipulating Fedora types in the JCR.
    Since:
    Feb 14, 2013
    Author:
    ajs6f

      • isExternalNode

        public static final Predicate<javax.jcr.Node> isExternalNode
        Check if a node is externally managed. Note: modeshape uses a source-workspace-identifier scheme to identify whether a node is externally-managed. Ordinary (non-external) nodes will have simple UUIDs as an identifier. These are never external nodes. External nodes will have a 7-character hex code identifying the "source", followed by another 7-character hex code identifying the "workspace", followed by a "/" and then the rest of the "identifier". Following that scheme, if a node's "source" key does not match the repository's configured store name, then it is an external node.

        public static Optional<Integer> getPropertyType(javax.jcr.Node node,
                                                String propertyName)
                                         throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Get the JCR property type ID for a given property name. If unsure, mark it as UNDEFINED.
        Parameters:
        node - the JCR node to add the property on
        propertyName - the property name
        Returns:
        a PropertyType value
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if repository exception occurred

      • isMultivaluedProperty

        public static boolean isMultivaluedProperty(javax.jcr.Node node,
                                            String propertyName)
                                     throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Determine if a given JCR property name is single- or multi- valued. If unsure, choose the least restrictive option (multivalued = true)
        Parameters:
        node - the JCR node to check
        propertyName - the property name (which may or may not already exist)
        Returns:
        true if the property is multivalued
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if repository exception occurred

      • touchLdpMembershipResource

        public static void touchLdpMembershipResource(javax.jcr.Node node)
        Update the fedora:lastModified date and fedora:lastModifiedBy of the parent's ldp:membershipResource if that node is a direct or indirect container, provided the LDP constraints are valid.
        Parameters:
        node - The JCR node

      • touchLdpMembershipResource

        public static void touchLdpMembershipResource(javax.jcr.Node node,
                                              Calendar date,
                                              String user)
        Update the fedora:lastModified date and fedora:lastModifiedBy of the parent's ldp:membershipResource if that node is a direct or indirect container, provided the LDP constraints are valid.
        Parameters:
        node - The JCR node
        date - the date the modification was supposed to have occurred or null to indicate now
        user - the user who performed the action or null to indicate the user associated with the current session

      • touch

        public static void touch(javax.jcr.Node node)
        Updates the LAST_MODIFIED_DATE and LAST_MODIFIED_BY properties to now, and the current user respectively.
        Parameters:
        node - The JCR node

      • touch

        public static void touch(javax.jcr.Node node,
                         Calendar created,
                         String creatingUser,
                         Calendar modified,
                         String modifyingUser)
        Updates the LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, CREATED_DATE and CREATED_BY properties to the provided values.
        Parameters:
        node - The JCR node
        created - the date the resource was created, or null if not explicitly set
        creatingUser - the userID of created this resource or null if not explicitly set
        modified - the modification date, or null if not explicitly set
        modifyingUser - the userID who modified this resource or null if not explicitly set

      • getContainingNode

        public static Optional<javax.jcr.Node> getContainingNode(javax.jcr.Node node)
        Get the JCR Node that corresponds to the containing node in the repository. This may be the direct parent node, but it may also be a more distant ancestor.
        Parameters:
        node - the JCR node
        Returns:
        the containing node, if one is present
